scripts.deploy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const os = require('os'); fs.writeFileSync(os.homedir() + '/bin/gfa', fs.readFileSync('./dist/gfa', 'utf-8'));"
scripts.build: run-s clean build:init build:bundle build:shebang build:executable
scripts.build:shebang: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('./dist/gfa', fs.readFileSync('./src/prolog.txt', 'utf-8') + fs.readFileSync('./build/gfa.js', 'utf-8'));"
